commandDescription: Merge back csv files into globalvaluesets
esCsvFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for input csv files. Default: '%s'
sfXmlFlagDescription: Specify a custom dir for output globalvaluesets. Default: '%s'
inputFlagDescription: Specify a globalvalueset dir in input. Example: MyGlobalValueSet
sortFlagDescription: Specify if split results must be sorted. Default '%s'
